entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as a person who was supposed to be third in line for the sneaker. He is also given brandy by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as a person who was supposed to be back in about a minute with Lupin. He is later seen falling and unconscious.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as a person who was supposed to be back in about a minute with George. He is later seen supporting George.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as a person who reappeared carrying a bottle of brandy.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a person who pointed at something several feet away.

entities.name: david (dad)
entities.description: Dad is mentioned as a person whose sneaker was supposed to be second.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person whose sneaker was supposed to be second.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who ran forward and seized George's legs.

relationships.description: Harry ran forward and seized George's legs.
Mrs. Weasley handed a bottle of brandy to Hagrid.
Ginny pointed at the blue light that appeared in the darkness.
